data.content:
簡介Acker函數，並列出Acker(2,3)的求解過程。

  • Acker函數是一種輸出值增長很快的遞迴函式，為一種非原始遞迴函數，需要兩個自然數輸入。
  • Acker(2,3)
    = Acker( 1, Acker(2,2) )
    = Acker( 1, Acker(2,1) )
    = Acker( 1, Acker(2,0) )
    = Acker( 2,0 )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,0) )
    = Acker( 1,0 )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,2) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,1) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,0) )
    = Acker( 1,0 )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,4) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,3) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,2) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,1) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,0) )
    = Acker( 1,0 )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,6) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,5) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,4) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,3) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,2) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,1) )
    = Acker( 0, Acker(1,0) )
    = Acker( 1,0 )
    = 9
